constructor-arg.value: select id,order_id as orderId,star_level as starLevel, content,title,member_id as memberId,item_id as itemId, sku_id as skuId,status,operator_id as operatorId, create_time as createTime,reason from T_MEM_COMMENT_LOG as mcl where 1=1 #if($memberId) and mcl.member_id =:memberId #end #if($orderId) and mcl.order_id =:orderId #end #if($skuId) and mcl.sku_id =:skuId #end

select id,order_id as orderId,star_level as starLevel, content,title,member_id as memberId,item_id as itemId, sku_id as skuId,status,operator_id as operatorId, create_time as createTime,reason from T_MEM_COMMENT_LOG as mcl where mcl.id =:id
